Articles.Content:
considering making something using this, i've been needing a good (long range) beamed power mod that doesnt add a bunch of other stuff for a while

(entirely so i can make a sun station to beam power across the system)

Trying this!

Removed the configs for NFeX, and replaced with my own mm patch to add missing reflector, and add transmit/receive functions to a few other antennas (both stock and NFeX).
every time im on a vessel with a beamed power part, the game freezes for about 5 seconds, then unfreezes for about 2 seconds, then freezes again on repeat, anybody know what could be causing this?

@Aniruddh

Anyway to make this mod transmit a different resource? I tried cloning the repo & replacing all ECHash with ResourceHash, then replacing ElectricCharge with 'ThermalPower', but promptly ran into build issues. I also changed the references to unity dlls so that they go to my local copies.. any help?

 

Edit: problem resolved, the mod depended on an older dll of itself for some reason?

Edited June 8 by KspNoobUsernameTaken
